Reviews.Content: stayed family 5 travelling eurostar disneyland xmas eve bit apprehensive approached hotel stuck road dubious looking bbs albeit 5 minutes walk kings cross st pancras family extra bed joined kitchenette totally misleading led believe reasonable amount space ok 2 nearly impossible move 1 bed takes virtually space bed kitchenette joke sink kitchen bit space filled table chairs wedged couldnt physically move bathroom ridiculously package cost nearly 350 pounds nights apart reasonably reception cant breakfast joke hard boiled eggs toast coffeetea looked basement appalling experience avoid costs

Reviews.Content: positives cheap near kings cross thats fairly clean negatives nasty desk manager appealing neighborhood booked bedroom suite wireless internet kitchen tried 15 3rd floor elevator goes 2 climb stair bags wo help standard getting 7 12 12 king bed single beds table 2 chairs living couch kitchen didnt stove oven refrigerator ive seen wine fridge internet 10 euros 4 hrs surprise
